page.title: 06Grandma's Day- Spennymoor.
page.content: I got up at 8 am, made myself a cup of tea, had a bath, got dressed, made breakfast for myself and my husband, had a look at the daily paper, washed the breakfast dishes and then tidied up the living room and kitchen. Next I made the dinner and again washed up, before going shopping with my friend. As it was Gala day in Spennymoor we stood and watched the jazz bands, floats and vintage cars. After this we shopped and were ready for a cup of tea, so off we went to a snack bar before catching the bus home. I then made the tea, washed up, had a rest, and watched the tennis on the television. By now it was 7pm so I went round to our communal hall and had a game of Bingo.After supper I sat and watched the film until bedtime. I put the milk bottles out pulled all the plugs out and locked up.
